items.sentence: Tom gave a lot of suggestions, but I didn\'t like any of them.
Tom and Mary spent a lot of time together when they were kids.
Tom and Mary wanted to spend the rest of their lives together.
Do you think that Tom and Mary are going to get back together?
Good-looking people are good-looking no matter what they wear.
I kneeled down to get a better look at what was on the ground.
I was surprised that Tom was among the suspects in the murder.
Tom told Mary she was the most beautiful woman he\'d ever met.
Tom told Mary that she had the prettiest eyes he\'d ever seen.
Tom knew that Mary wouldn\'t want to eat at a fast food place.
